A Semi Rural Cottage To Fall In Love With!
UNDER CONTRACT. HOME OPEN CANCELLED.
Welcome to the listing :) a beautiful, fully renovated weatherboard cottage with loads of charm and unique features. They are sad sellers, but are moving interstate to be closer to family.
This home will be perfect for the first time home owner or couple looking for something special and unique? Maybe you are an empty nester or downsizer looking to sit back, relax and watch the garden grow?

Sit in the front verandah and watch the sun set, or nestle at the back and enjoy the privacy and intimacy of the pergola area. Want to tinker or create? A stone's throw from Yarra Road Primary School, perfectly located for couples who plan to create a family down the track. A bus stop is a stone's throw in the other direction. Wonga Park Post Office, Bottle shop and Milk Bar is a short drive away. MacAdam Square shopping Centre and coffee shops are a 4 minute drive away, right opposite Luther College High School.
If you like what you have read so far, a viewing is essential. But be prepared to fall in love.

Magical Views With Approved Town Planning Permit
...To build an equally magnificent home. This stunning property features mountainous views of the Dandenongs and valleys, with plans and Town Planning permit to build a substantial home amassing approximately 48 squares. Situated in a peaceful no-thru road, as you enter into an exclusive, gated community, you'll fall in love with the natural environment with serene trees and beautiful homes; you'll feel as though you are 100 miles away from anywhere, but with the convenience of being only minutes from everywhere. Whether you're a builder or simply looking for that perfect parcel of land to establish your dream home, this considerable-sized allotment (approx 2032m2) presents a golden opportunity with all the hard work already completed - or you could alter the plans and add your own ideas (this would be subject to council approval).
When the home is complete, you'll enjoy a meandering driveway up to the dwelling, cleverly designed to lessen the angle of ascent and includes a smart turning point to ensure a straight forward departure. The floorplan also consists of two additional bathrooms, study, four-car accommodation, workshop, multiple living areas including; lounge (sitting), family room, dining, rumpus and billiards. The kitchen is a dream for the entertainer with a large walk-in pantry and island bench where you can sip on a glass of red whilst cooking dinner and enjoy the magnificent outlook - life doesn't get better than this. Your house warming event will see guests enjoying the verandah, balcony and separate patio where the dazzling lights will appear like a sparkling ocean.

This means you will reside within close proximity to shops, schools and public transport with everyday living convenience at your fingertips.
Croydon North has become synonymous of being an area of prestige; therefore this magical setting of Fairview Avenue is an address worth noting!
